column4: I NEED HELP can someone tell me how to fix this error Couldn't set video mode: Couldn't find matching GLX visual
what videocard do you have and what is your xorg.conf file set to load as your driver?

i have a ati radeon x800pro  my xorg.conf is setup with the default stuff i got gl to work i think as i did some gl test with cogs but i cant get fgl or whatever its called to work and i need that for unreal2004
tell me what the driver is set to in your /etc/X11/xorg.conf file
glxgears works but the fglxgears does not work
what part of the xorg will it be in
it will be labeled as your graphics card, usually towards the middle of the file
Section "Device"
Identifier "ATI Technologies, Inc. Radeon X800 Pro (R420 JI)"
Driver  "fglrx"
BusID  "PCI:2:0:0"
EndSection
is that what you meant?
don't paste
but yes
do you know how to fix it?
hold on
read this http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=24557
g2g

k thanx for your help, bye
